CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 28, 1962, pg. A3, reads: "Easter Worshippers Add Frills to Faith - Union Baptist - Members of Union Baptist Church, East End, who attended Easter Sunday morning worship services, included this bevy of young beauties in bonnets, bustles and bows. - All Photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Women and children, gathered in front of Union Baptist Church with sign reading "...Campbell minister," after Easter services
